document.full_text: u.s. import prices rose more than expected in march to post their largest increase in more than 1-1/2 years, driven by a surge in imported petroleum costs and higher food prices, a government report showed on tuesday.
document.title: march import price rise biggest in over 1-1/2 years
lines_and_colors: u.s. import prices rose more than expected in march to post their largest increase in more than 1-1/2 years, driven by a surge in imported petroleum costs and higher food prices, a government report showed on tuesday.
